requirements: Prerequisites: high school chemistry, mathematics, and Earth science.Â Recommended preparation: G&G 110 or 205.
description:
The origins, geologic settings, exploration, distribution, and extraction of coal, oil, and natural gas as finite Earth resources. The role of fossil fuels in the world's energy systems; environmental impacts of fossil fuels, including climate change; the transition to low-carbon energy sources.
Prerequisites: high school chemistry, mathematics, and Earth science.Â Recommended preparation: G&G 110 or 205.
title: Fossil Fuels and World Energy
